## A New Place to Share Sports Data Visualisation

In this blog, I would like to share experiments, half-cooked ideas, and data visualisation techniques. Some of these posts will be treated like a digital garden so expect things to change. 

## What I Plan to Do

Over the past year, I've created a few visualisations that I shared online. This website is a place where I hope to share more about the process and the visualisations that I create.
